title: Middle of Ranked Match: Says I Disconnected But No Rejoin?
body:
Randomly, while I was attempting to fight, it stated that it was attempting to reconnect to server, and it never did. I exited, and it opened the LoL client, the one where the shop, runes, champs, etc. are located (not the actual game itself).

No option to reconnect, no apparent penalty?

WTH is going on?

replies.body: Sorry for the trouble you went through here.  :/ This may have been due to the ISP issues last night.  Is everything okay now?
Yeah I had issues most of yesterday (main reason I didn't do ranked), it was fine tbh. I needed to go to sleep anyways. Today so far it's been good, thanks!

Ahhhhh sounds like a classic case of the game crashing server side. It doesn't happen too relatively often, but when it does it happens just like this. Everyone gets booted, there's no penalties or punishments, nobody can reconnect (since the game no longer exists) and every can requeue like normal.
